mapper.select: select h.home_name, b.h_num, b.avg_score from o2_home h, (select rownum r_num, a.* from (select h_num ,avg(score) as avg_score from o2_review group by h_num order by avg_score desc ) a ) b where h.num = b.h_num and r_num >= 1 and r_num <= 10 order by avg_score desc
select * from o2_home where tag like '%'||#{tag}||'%'
